sql.sqlstr: SELECT 'TEST' TYPE, '1' CODE,'你好' VALUE,1 SORT
SELECT 'SYSUSER' TYPE, USER_ID CODE,USERNAME VALUE,USER_SORT SORT FROM SYS_USER WHERE VALID_TYPE='1'
SELECT 'SYSORG' TYPE, ORG_ID CODE,ORG_NAME VALUE,ORG_ORDER SORT FROM SYS_ORG_INFO WHERE VALID_TYPE='1'
SELECT 'BUSINESSAPP' TYPE, ID CODE,NAME VALUE,ID SORT FROM RES_BUSSINESS_APP WHERE STATUS='1'
